RelatedSentence: NeoTurks is India 's premier digital ad - tech company that is building innovative data and ad - serving platforms to help clients reach out to premium audiences in India , Asia Pacific , Australia and Middle East through its subsidiaries Lyxel - a data and demand side platform ; Spidio - a video ad - tech platform and 1 Flamingo - a social media innovator .

NeoTurks is India 's premier digital ad - tech company that is building innovative data and ad - serving platforms to help clients reach out to premium audiences in India , Asia Pacific , Australia and Middle East through its subsidiaries Lyxel - a data and demand side platform ; Spidio - a video ad - tech platform and 1 Flamingo - a social media innovator .
NeoTurks was founded by Dev Batra ( IIM Lucknow , NIT Surat , Serial Entrepreneur ) and Nishith Srivastava ( Lucknow University , Serial Entrepreneur ) .
In a very short time , NeoTurks has added several marquee clients across all of its service offerings and currently in the process of raising its Series A investments .
